DOC.brief_summary: The study design randomize 2-way cross-over study assess bioavailability carotenoid flavonoid sweet orange orange juice . Volunteers follow wash-out period 2 week prior eat either 400 g fresh orange 719 g orange juice . The amount test food adjust deliver equal amount β-cryptoxanthin ( 740 µg ) . After consecutive wash-out period 2 week , procedure repeat volunteer ingest complementary test food . Blood sample collect 8 time point 9.5 h test meal consumption . Additionally , 24 h-urine collect evaluate flavonoid recovery .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Carotenoids Flavonoids From Fresh Oranges Orange Juice .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult men woman BMI : 1760 Age : 1865 Women lactate pregnant plan pregnant Individuals use tobacco product Individuals metabolic malabsorption disorder Individuals history cancer Individuals history liver insufficiency Individuals history chronic lipid metabolismrelated disease Individuals allergy orange Obese individual ( BMI > 30 )
